37516.summary: Some customers in the Luxton area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37516.title: May 20 – Winnipeg (Luxton) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Manitoba Hydro is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
